__e: - Well, if you'd have missed, we'd be very dead by now.
Today, if it weren't for you... I'm afraid we'd all be dead
We'd have been dead if it wasrt for my Uncle Mike.
But if the blackout area increased or, worse still, embraced the whole screen ... (Peel) We would be in trouble.
We'd sure be in good if you were his daughter.
I swear to God, if I was flying this thing, we'd be home by now.
We all know damn well we wouldn't be here if it hadn't been for you.
If I hadn't spent those years in jail, we wouldn't be here now.
If it wasn't for them, we would not be here either.
If we'd gone after the bees instead of wasting time with your science teams... - ... we wouldn't be in this mess!
If Johnny hadn't wanted to buy that silk for his wife, we, we wouldn't be in this mess.
If Johnny hadn't wanted to buy some silk for his wife, we wouldn't be in this mess. (sighing)
And we wouldn't be having this brand-new fight.
You promised we would be together again for Christmas dinner.
And if it weren't for her, we'd never be together again.
Without respect for the freedom of others we would not be together four four years.
We'd all be in the ground if you hadn't taken that tank off us in that clearing.
If it hadn't been for that, we'd all be layin' around here dead right now.
If we'd a had a smart fellow like you at the head of this deal we'd all be rich now.
